## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d24178a5c1942d98ef8e4c5c15f5581e0114cd4aa496a966a981eb4d0231e009)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'portrait-mode-video' @ 99.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
